data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Portimonense.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Portimonense throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 5, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Portimonense drive forward but Lucas Fernandes is judged offside.
Rafael Barbosa (Tondela) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Tondela.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Tondela close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Fabricio of Portimonense is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 15, Tondela pushes forward through Rafael Barbosa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Enzo Martinez (Tondela) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 15, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Portimonense have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 19, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Tondela.
In the minute 21, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 23, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Tondela throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
In Tondela Portimonense drive forward through Fabricio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 25, Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tondela's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Portimonense throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Tondela Tondela's Tomislav Strkalj is caught offside.
In the minute 31, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Rafael Barbosa puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 33, Tomislav Strkalj instrumental with a fine assist.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
In the minute 37, Portimonense are pushing forward but Anderson de Oliveira da Silva's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Anderson de Oliveira da Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portimonense.
In the minute 40, Koki Anzai for Portimonense drives towards goal at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Tondela.
In the minute 41, Portimonense are coming forward and Fali Cande gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 42, Joao Pedro (Tondela) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tondela.
Portimonense's Fali Cande is whistled for offside at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 44, Tondela's Yohan Tavares has been booked in Tondela.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Tondela.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Tondela.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Tondela.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a first substitution, with Ricardo Vaz Te replacing Aylton Boa Morte.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Tondela a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense drives forward and Lucas Fernandes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 49, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Tondela have a dangerous throw-in.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Attention is being given to Tondelaâ€™s Yohan Tavares and play has been suspended briefly.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Portimonense throw-in in Tondela's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, The home team has substituted Yohan Tavares with Joao Jaquite. Pako Ayestaran is thus making his first change.
Tondela have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Welinton Junior is on a sub for Pedro Sa for Portimonense.
In the minute 56, Welinton Junior hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Portimonense.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira blows against Portimonense's Ricardo Vaz Te for offside.
In the minute 58, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 62, Portimonense's Fabricio gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
In the minute 65, Lucas Fernandes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The home team have replaced Joao Pedro with Tiago. This is the second substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
Lucas Fernandes has recovered and rejoins the match in Tondela.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Portimonense.
Ricardo Vaz Te (Portimonense) gets a yellow card.
Salvador Agra of Tondela smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Tondela.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Tondela's Rafael Barbosa fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Salvador Agra (Tondela) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 74, Portimonense advance rapidly upfield but Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira blows for offside.
At Estadio Joao Cardoso, Welinton Junior has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 75, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Tondela.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tondela.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in Tondela.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
In the minute 78, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Tondela throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 80, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 81, Henrique Gelain is replacing Fali Cande for the away team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mohamed Naoufel Khacef for Tondela who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Tondela's Mohamed Naoufel Khacef looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 86, Mohamed Naoufel Khacef (Tondela) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Pedro Augusto.
Souleymane Anne is replacing Tomislav Strkalj for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Portimonense.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Portimonense.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Anderson de Oliveira da Silva for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick Tondela.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Tondela.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Dener (Portimonense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In Tondela Tondela attack through Salvador Agra. The finish is off target, however.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
